content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal Mine at position (y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)
- Burner mining drill (position y2)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x to the assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to craft without sufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates, which must be available either in your inventory or produced by a furnace.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for any existing entities that may block placement.
